metadata.dc:author: Villar López, A
Torreblanca Gil, A
Rubio Barbón, S
Suárez del Villar Acebal, R
Calvo Rodríguez, C E
Escalada Rodríguez, P
Rodríguez Cocina, B
metadata.dc:description: The authors present a case of tuberculous arthritis of ankle with sinovial fluid and sputum aspirate Lowenstein positive (M. tuberculosis) in a patient non inmunocomprometid and review the clinical, diagnosis and treatment aspects of this entity, and show the difficult diagnosis in cases of radiology normal or low suspect.
metadata.dc:title: Artritis tuberculosa de tobillo.
[Tuberculosis of ankle].
